q: In software testing, which of the following methodologies is classified as a technique that is used in the white box testing procedure?
In software testing, which of the following methodologies is classified as a technique that is used in the white box testing procedure?

In software testing, how many inputs are required for 100% statement coverage in the following code:

Read student_name
Read record
If age < 18 then 
    Print Reject student
Else
    Print accept student
End if
In white box testing, the value of an input field that takes years as input ranges between 1800 and 2018. What are the extreme values of the inputs that are required to test this field?

In software testing, what is the minimum number of test cases required to achieve 100% statement and decision coverage in the following code:

Read X, Y
If X>=2
    Print X+Y
else
    Print X-Y
EndIf
If Y<1
    Print Y-X
End;
